Specimen Container(s): Healthlink transport system (Liquid Amies, Stuart’s liquid, Amies Gel, Stuart’s Gel)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Hardy Diagnostics Strep B Carrot Broth One-Step, a selective and chromogenic enrichment medium for qualitative detection of Group B Streptococcus (GBS) in anovaginal swabs from pregnant women.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for detection of Group B Streptococcus (GBS) from anovaginal specimens collected from pregnant women as an aid in qualitative determination of GBS colonization; color change indicates a positive result for GBS, with subculture required for non-hemolytic strains and confirmation of negatives.
